title: No Fee / Prime Nolita / Huge New Renovated / Designer Kitchen
posting_body: ['No Fee 3 bedroom apartment featuring condo finishes, including a marble bathroom with rainforest shower head, washer & dryer, and a granite kitchen with gooseneck faucet and stainless steel dishwasher, wine cooler, and microwave.', 'Pet friendly unit is accented by hardwood floors, high ceilings, and exposed brick.', 'The perfect place to call home for those looking for the best location and convenience.', 'This residence features:', 'Granite Counter-tops', 'Stainless Steel Appliances with Dishwasher & Wine fridge', 'Marble bathroom with Rainforest Shower', 'In-unit washer/dryer', 'Ample closet space', 'Hardwood floors', 'Exposed brick.', '-High Ceilings', 'Located just steps from an abundance of shopping, restaurants including Balthazar and Bread, and countless entertainmnet venues.. Conveniently located close to several subway lines, including the 6, B D, F, M, N, and R trains.']
